Bash(powershell -File - <<'PS1'
$r = Invoke-WebRequest -Uri 'https://git.wjtb.kr/ai-labs/bookclub30/bc3_int_viewer/raw/branch/master/%EC%83%98%ED%94%8C%EB%8F%84%EC%84%9C/9789814983754_Scholastic_3%20Cats.pdf' -Method HEAD -UseBasicParsing
Write-Output "Status: $\($r.StatusCode\)"
Write-Output "---HEADERS---"
foreach \($h in $r.Headers.GetEnumerator\(\)\) {
    Write-Output "$\($h.Key\): $\($h.Value\)"
}
